          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Capacitors in parallel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kondensatoren in der Ähnlichkeit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Condensateurs en parallèle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Capacitores na paralela</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Condensatori parallelamente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παράλληλος πυκνωτών παράλληλα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Condensadores en paralelo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates that two capacitors connected in parallel is equivalent to a single larger capacitor.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">capacitors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">voltage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">charges</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">circuit components</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">parallel connection</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß zwei Kondensatoren, 
die in der Ähnlichkeit angeschlossen werden, mit einem einzelnen 
größeren Kondensator gleichwertig ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre que deux 
condensateurs reliés en parallèle est équivalent à un plus grand 
condensateur simple.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra que dois capacitores 
conectados na paralela são equivalentes a um único capacitor maior.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra che due 
condensatori collegati parallelamente è equivalenti ad un singolo 
più grande condensatore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει ότι δύο πυκνωτές 
σύνδεσαν παράλληλα τον παράλληλο είναι ισοδύναμοι με έναν 
ενιαίο μεγαλύτερο πυκνωτή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra que dos condensadores
conectados en paralelo son equivalentes a un solo condensador más 
grande.</string>
          </description>
